code: import axios from'axios';var API=axios.create({baseURL:'https://social-media-json-api.herokuapp.com'});API.interceptors.request.use(function(req){if(localStorage.getItem('profile')){req.headers={'authorization':"Bearer ".concat(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('profile')).token),'content-type':'multipart/form-data'};}return req;});export var getPosts=function getPosts(){return API.get("/posts/getPosts");};export var createPost=function createPost(newPost){return API.post("/posts/createPost",newPost);};export var updatePost=function updatePost(postId,post){return API.patch("/posts/updatePost/".concat(postId),post);};export var deletePost=function deletePost(postId){return API.delete("/posts/deletePost/".concat(postId));};export var likePost=function likePost(postId){return API.patch("/posts//likePost/".concat(postId));};export var signIn=function signIn(formData){return API.post("/user/signin",formData);};export var signUp=function signUp(formData){return API.post("/user/signup",formData);};
